data.price: Musa menjawab, "Pengetahuan tentang itu ada di sisi Tuhan-ku, di dalam sebuah kitab 926, Tuhan kami tidak akan salah dan tidak (pula) lupa;
data.arabic: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِندَ رَبِّي فِي كِتَٰبٖۖ لَّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّي وَلَا يَنسَى

meta.transliteration: qāla ʿil'muhā ʿinda rabbī fī kitābin lā yaḍillu rabbī walā yansā

dua.name: Dua for Inner Contentment
dua.significanceReason: Seeks understanding and acceptance of divine decree, promoting inner peace and contentment.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
